channel.title: GrinderScape PK
channel.description:

EDIT: Maybe it was a FalsePositive....

item.title: GrinderScape PK
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

What is this “Grown mode” you speak of? If the majority of this community is 12 how can it ever be in this so called “Grown Mode”?

[quote=“pb600, post:77, topic:412755”]1 - I asked To MoparScape a favour to remove my client information from topic even because there’s no virus in my client, the client reported as the one with virus was the old one made by other people, im a new person working with a new client to GrinderScape.
Im wrong if i don’t want my client links posted here? Like grown people answer that![/quote]

pb600:

[quote]Yet there is nothing to take down? The only thing that he posted is stuff that is downloaded to your computer upon downloading the cache, he didn’t post your client files so just piss off.

That’s from your point of view, some of these things are downloaded automatically and by own exprience I saw peoples trying and failing to get the original client file. There’s a thing under that all so no this link that he posted is not the one that you use to play the game.

2 - And as he said hes not going to remove the link I ACCEPTED HIS CHOISE and i told that i was going to change the whole client and update everything to change these links.
3 - Why after that! after i end with the problem, come a guy that never seen my client or know what about i was talking saying that im a leecher?
Im wrong here?

“m1lkman” we are in grown mode: ON please act like one.[/quote]

Hypocrisy at its finest, First your complaining about his decision but then your accepting it?

Read full topic

item.title: GrinderScape PK
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

pb600:

[quote]Yet there is nothing to take down? The only thing that he posted is stuff that is downloaded to your computer upon downloading the cache, he didn’t post your client files so just piss off.

That’s from your point of view, some of these things are downloaded automatically and by own exprience I saw peoples trying and failing to get the original client file. There’s a thing under that all so no this link that he posted is not the one that you use to play the game.

2 - And as he said hes not going to remove the link I ACCEPTED HIS CHOISE and i told that i was going to change the whole client and update everything to change these links.
3 - Why after that! after i end with the problem, come a guy that never seen my client or know what about i was talking saying that im a leecher?
Im wrong here?

“m1lkman” we are in grown mode: ON please act like one.[/quote]

Sec, let me turn the switch on my back to “grown mode: ON”. I believe they call that acting mature. What you just said right there sounds like something my 6 year old cousin would say. Where in any of what I just said would make it seem like I was immature? Of course I “trolled” (I hate memes) but I didn’t think you were being serious. All I saw was you raging at people for telling you to chill.

Read full topic
